mutation {
	createDataproduct(
		input: {
			name: "NewName"
			description: "New description"
			repo: "somerepo"
			pii: false
			group: "nada@nav.no"
			keywords: ["keyword1"]
			bigquery: { projectID: "team-prod", dataset: "dataset", table: "table" }
		}
	) {
		id
		name
		description
		repo
		pii
		owner { group }
		keywords
	}
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.createDataproduct.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS

{
  "data": {
    "createDataproduct": {
      "name": "NewName",
      "description": "New description",
      "keywords": [
        "keyword1"
      ],
      "owner": {
        "group": "nada@nav.no"
      },
      "pii": false,
      "repo": "somerepo"
    }
  }
}

STORE dataproduct_id=data.createDataproduct.id
